name: Get First Image Set As Featured Image
author: Venugopal

sections.description:
After installed this plugin automatically retrieve the first image from content and its set as featured image.

More WordPress help please follow below link
Venugopal
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

In WordPress:

Go to Plugins > Add New > search for :: Get First Image Set As Featured Image ::
Press Install Now for the Get First Image Set As Featured Image plugin
Press Activate Plugin

To install manually instead:

Upload the get_first_image_set_as_featured Image directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • After installed this plugin automatically retrieve the first image from content and its set as featured image.
  • No need to do the setting
